00019 #include "sparse_hough_space2d.h"
00020 #include <algorithm>
00021 
00022 namespace ipl {
00023         
00024 using std::lower_bound;
00025 
00027 // Construction/Destruction
00029 
00030 CSparseHoughSpace2D::CSparseHoughSpace2D() 
00031 { 
00032 }
00033 
00034 
00035 CSparseHoughSpace2D::CSparseHoughSpace2D(ostream& os, int ImageWidth, int ImageHeight, int Thickness,
00036         int Threshold, CHoughBase::PARAMETERTYPE ParamType)
00037 {
00038         this->Initialize(ImageWidth, ImageHeight, Thickness, Threshold, ParamType);
00039 }
00040 
00041 
00042 CSparseHoughSpace2D::~CSparseHoughSpace2D()
00043 {
00044 }
00045 
00046 
00048 // Public methods
00050 
00051 
00052 bool CSparseHoughSpace2D::Initialize(int ImageWidth, int ImageHeight, int Thickness, int Threshold, 
00053         CHoughBase::PARAMETERTYPE ParamType)
00054 {
00055         ComputeQuantization(ImageWidth, ImageHeight, Thickness, ParamType);
00056         m_space.resize(GetQuantizationValue(1));
00057         SetThreshold(Threshold);
00058         return true;
00059 }
00060 
00061 
00062 bool CSparseHoughSpace2D::Inc(const CPoint2D<int>& Position)
00063 {
00064         CPoint2D<int> newCell(Position.GetY(), 1);
00065         str_list<CPoint2D<int> > y_list = (str_list<CPoint2D<int> >) m_space[Position.GetX()];
00066         str_list<CPoint2D<int> >::iterator p = lower_bound(y_list.begin(), y_list.end(), newCell);
00067         
00068         if (p->GetX() == Position.GetY())
00069         {
00070                 p->AddY(1);
00071                 
00072                 if (p->GetY() > (int)GetThreshold())
00073                 {
00074                         SetPeakCoordinates(Position);
00075                         return true;
00076                 }
00077         } 
00078         else 
00079                 y_list.insert(p, newCell); 
00080         
00081         m_space[Position.GetX()] = y_list;
00082         return false;
00083 }
00084 
00085 
00086 bool CSparseHoughSpace2D::Alloc()
00087 { 
00088         for(unsigned int i=0; i<m_space.size(); i++)
00089                 ((list<CPoint2D<int> >) m_space[i]).clear();
00090         return true; 
00091 }
00092 
00093 
00094 void CSparseHoughSpace2D::ToImage(CStdImage& OutputImg)
00095 {
00096         str_list<CPoint2D<int> > y_list;
00097         CPoint2D<int> cell;
00098         str_list<CPoint2D<int> >::iterator itY;
00099         unsigned int x_coord, y_coord;
00100         OutputImg.AllocFast(GetQuantizationValue(1), GetQuantizationValue(2), 8);
00101         OutputImg.Flush(0);
00102         
00103         for (x_coord=0; x_coord<m_space.size(); x_coord++)
00104         {
00105                 
00106                 y_list = (str_list<CPoint2D<int> >) m_space[x_coord];
00107                 for (itY=y_list.begin(); itY!=y_list.end(); itY++)
00108                 {
00109                         cell = (CPoint2D<int>) *itY;
00110                         y_coord = cell.GetX();
00111                         //cout << x_coord << " " << y_coord << " " << cell.GetY() << endl;
00112                         OutputImg.SetPixel(x_coord, y_coord, cell.GetY());
00113                 }
00114         }
00115         
00116         CHoughBase::ScaleHoughImage(OutputImg);
00117 }
